content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. How can I help you today? Are you looking to schedule a plumbing, electrical, or HVAC service?
Hi! I need someone to look at some outlets in my living room. They aren’t working.
Thank you for letting me know! To get started, may I have your name please?
Thanks, Katie! Could you please provide your address so I can confirm we serve your area?
Thank you! One moment while I check if you're in our service area.
I’m currently having trouble verifying your service area. I’m going to connect you to one of our team members for assistance. Please hold on just a moment.
reason: Agent could not calculate service area

content: Hi Katie, this is Judy from XYZ. Thanks so much for waiting! I see you'd like help with your living room outlets. Yes, we do serve Eastbrook. When would be the best time for us to send a technician?
Thanks, Judy! Tomorrow morning works best if possible.
Great! I’ll book you in for tomorrow morning and will send you a confirmation shortly. Is there anything else you’d like to know, such as pricing or what to expect?
